api_token.description: Zenloop API Token. You can get the API token in settings page here

date_from.description: Zenloop date_from. Format: 2021-10-24T03:30:30Z or 2021-10-24. Leave empty if only data from current data should be synced

survey_id.description: Zenloop Survey ID. Can be found here. Leave empty to pull answers from all surveys

survey_group_id.description: Zenloop Survey Group ID. Can be found by pulling All Survey Groups via SurveyGroups stream. Leave empty to pull answers from all survey groups
